scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:client: rm -rf public/*.* && rm -rf public/**/*.* && rm -rf src/ts/*.js && rm -rf src/ts/**/*.js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:server && npm run compile:static
scripts.compile:client: tsc --project tsconfig.client.json && npm run create:public && browserify src/ts/index.js -o public/bundle.js
scripts.compile:static: for file in src/static/*; do echo "$file"; echo "public/${file#src\/static\/}"; cp "$file" "public/${file#src\/static\/}";done
scripts.dev: npm run compile && concurrently "node server/app.js" "sleep 1 && npm run open"
